The **geocomp*x*** project develops open-source, open-access resources for geocomputation.
Financial support helps sustain development, maintenance, and community engagement.

## Ways to support

There are two primary ways to support the geocomp*x* project financially:

### 1. One-time or recurring donations

You can donate directly via Liberapay:

- **Donate via Liberapay:** [https://liberapay.com/geocompx/](https://liberapay.com/geocompx/)

### 2. GitHub sponsorship

You can sponsor the project through GitHub Sponsors:

- **GitHub Sponsors:** [https://github.com/sponsors/geocompx](https://github.com/sponsors/geocompx)

## How contributions are used

Financial contributions are used to support the ongoing development and maintenance of the project. 
Depending on available funds, this may include:

- Covering domain, hosting, and other infrastructure costs
- Supporting contributors (e.g., book copies, small bounties, or other forms of recognition)
- Organizing community activities such as competitions, workshops, or other engagement events

## Other ways to help

In addition to financial support, you can help by:

- Contributing code, documentation, or examples
- Reporting issues or suggesting improvements
- Proposing blog posts or tutorials
- Sharing the project with colleagues, students, and communities

Every form of support helps make open-source geocomputational resources more sustainable and accessible (and motivates us to keep going)!
